item.title: Generating CPU Load with PowerShell
item.description: Placing CPU under stress with PowerShell So I have changed a few things in one of my lab servers and needed to make sure I would not “burn” the CPU down while I am sleeping if some process gets stuck at 100%… You never know what the gremlins on your apps are going to do while you’re at sleep, so I thought “Better be safe than sorry” and although a ThreadRipper 2 is… somehow hard to overload, I decided to give it a go and load it up.

item.title: Firstone
